title: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab.
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, there is no listing of children nodes.
EB: The children of the new data source should be listed out.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new data set without an SQL statement.
2. Make sure the new data source has no database/table/column information.

Actual behavior:
When changing the data source for the data set, there is no listing of children nodes in the data set editor page of the query tab.

Expected behavior:
When changing the data source, the children of the new data source should be listed out.

To reproduce:
1. Close the data set editor
2. Reopen the data set editor
